import React from 'react'; import '../hoja-de-estilos/Card.css'; function Card({ temp, max, min, name, img, onClose, handleOnDragEnd, humidity, lon, lat, date, description, wind, }) { // acá va tu código console.log(description); return (

{name}

{`Today - ${date}`}

{description}

{`${temp}°C`}

{`Min: ${min}°C`}

{`Max: ${max}°C`}

); } export default Card;
